All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddOns
This is an enum class for the add-ons that the user can pick when customizing their burger or sandwich.
Beverage
This class represents a beverage item in the menu.
BeverageController
The beverage controller handles all the actions of the beverage page, which creates the beverage based off the user customization
Bread
This is an enum class for the types of bread that a user can choose from when ordering a sandwich or a burger.
Burger
This class represents a Burger item in the menu.
BurgerController
The burger controller handles all the actions of the burger page, which creates the burger based off the user customization, users additionally have the option to change it to a combo
BurgerTest
 
Combo
This class represents a combo meal on the menu.
ComboController
The combo controller handles all the actions of the combo page, which creates the combo * based off the user customization
CurrentOrderController
This controller class manages the Current Order view in the application.
Flavor
This is an enum class with a list of 15 beverage flavors that a user can choose from.
Main
This is the driver class of our program containing the main method.
MainController
This is the main controller which sets up the main menu view
MenuItem
This class is an abtract class that represents the menu items
Order
This class represents an order made my the customer.
PlacedOrderController
This controller class manages the viewing, cancelling and exporting placed orders.
Protein
This is an enum class containing a list of different types of protein that a user can select when ordering a sandwich or burger.
Sandwich
This class represents a sandwich object on the menu.
SandwichController
The sandwich controller handles all the actions of the sandwich page, which creates the sandwich based off the user customization, users additionally have the option to change it to a combo
SandwichTest
 
Side
This enum class represents the side options of the application
SideController
The side controller handles all the actions of the side page, which creates the side based off the user customization
Sides
This class represents the side option on the menu.
Size
This is an enum class that specifies the 3 types of sizes that a user can choose from when ordering a drink.
